properties.body:
EASTERN ATLANTIC.
NAMIBIA TO CAPE VERDE.
48 FOOT S/V SKOOK, ALUMINIUM HULL, ONE PERSON
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT BETWEEN NAMIBIA
AND CAPE VERDE (15-06N 023-37W). LAST ASSUMED
POSITION 500 MILES SOUTH OF CAPE VERDE.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC BREMEN, PHONE: 49 421 536 870.
